Login for Webcam Controls

Add or Edit Sources

Camera ID

The ID naming convention is

  • Capital 2-letter state abbreviation
  • A hyphen
  • First letter capitalized city name (No spaces for 2-word names)

If a city has more than one camera add a second hyphen followed by a brief designator.



Stream Type

Keep this on "video/youtube" for YouTube streams.

Use "application/x-mpegURL" for HLS streams managed by a .m3u8 playlist.



View Is Enabled

True sets this among the motion-triggered streams to be shown.

False bypasses the site from automatic switching.

Stream URL

Input the current live stream URL. It will be saved to the database as soon as you change focus to another field. (Just press tab)
